item.description:
Alright everyone, sorry for the delay in getting this out, but we are doing another Prudential Academic Meetup this Saturday.
- Rob

Time: Saturday, May 19th, 4 - 6 PM

Directions: http://www.prudential...

Map (look at the upper left corner for the Terrace Food Court): http://www.prudential...

As you may know by now, we try to have an academic meetup at least once or twice each month. This gives everyone an opportunity to come and practice their Japanese or English with a bunch of motivated people. So, if you're itching to use that new Japanese slang or can't figure out all those crazy English grammar rules, here's a great place for some language practice.

The format of our meetings goes as follows:

4-5 PM - First Group: Self-introduction/Free Conversation/Study/Etc
-- change groups --
5-6 PM - Second Group: Self-introduction/Free Conversation/Study/Etc

By the way, we typically stay in the very back of the Prudential Food Court and should have little signs that say "meetup.com" for table markers. We look forward to seeing all of you there!
item.name: Prudential Academic Meetup
